doc.title: Diff
doc.section:
Display the differences between two paths.
Description
Display the differences between two paths. Each TARGET can be either a working copy path or URL.
If TARGET is a working copy path, then the means:
The client compares base and working copies of TARGET.
If the alternate syntax is used, the server compares URL1 and URL2 at revisions N and M respectively. If either N or M are ommitted, a value of HEAD is assumed.
Changes
Nothing
